item.title: This is now officially the world’s largest city, overtaking Tokyo - Time Out Worldwide
item.description:
1. This is now officially the world’s largest city, overtaking Tokyo  Time Out Worldwide
  2. Jakarta is now the world's largest city, beating out Tokyo in new U.N. report  NBC News
  3. Jakarta overtakes Tokyo as world’s most populous city, according to UN  The Guardian
  4. Jakarta Shoots to No. 1 in World Population Ranking From No. 33. How?  The New York Times
  5. Indonesia’s Jakarta now the world’s largest city, Tokyo falls to third: UN  Al Jazeera
